stories.text:
Do you think it matters in software development if certain team members have their camera almost always off?

What difference does it make?

Are you camera on or off?
stories.title: Ask HN: Does it matter if development team members have the camera off?

stories.text:
I remember my first job in a real estate agency in 2000 - if you'd told me that one day we could hover over a map and see house sale prices and an automated valuation, I wouldn't have believed you.

Plenty of organisations, associations, and government departments publish great data in secret - sometimes just without the fanfare it warrants, and sometimes surreptitiously because they are required to even if they don't want to publish.

What are some of the meaningful or cool data sources you've used or uncovered in the past?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some good sources of data that most people don't know about?
